Detailed Description

<< OBRW - OpenBoxRandomWallpaper >> -- obrw_wallpaper_opt.h

URL: http://deeagle.de

Copyright (c) 2007-2010 Martin Kock <code@deeagle.de>

Permission to use, copy, modify, distribute and sell this software and its documentation for any purpose is hereby granted without fee, provided that the above copyright notice appear in all copies and that both that copyright notice and this permission notice appear in supporting documentation. It is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.


The file includes all methods and functions which are in context to all things about a wallpaper.

void obrwWallpaperOpt_freeLocalsToClose ( void   ) 

Free all used allocated heap-memory (if used, to use before programm ends -> success and fail).

Returns:
Nothing, it's void
const char* obrwWallpaperOpt_getUsedWallpaper ( void   ) 

The getter-method to get the name of the last used wallpaper.

Returns:
The name of the last used wallpaper or NULL if failure.
Return values:
wallpapername success.
NULL fail.
int obrwWallpaperOpt_readDirAndSetWallpaper ( const char *  dirPath  ) 

Reads the wallpaperdir (attribute), add the wallpapers to a list and tries to set a random of the wallpapers.

Returns:
If some wallpaper is set, it will return EXIT_SUCCESS.
Return values:
EXIT_SUCCESS success.
EXIT_FAILED fail.
int obrwWallpaperOpt_setWallpaperWithFeh ( const char *  dirPath,
const char *  wpToSet 
)

Set a wallpaper with the external tool feh.

Returns:
If the wallpaper could be set with feh, it will return 0.
Return values:
0 success, wallpaper set.
-1 wallpaper is NULL.
-2 couldn't alocate heap-space.
